name: Ratvolution
description:
You are a simple working rat.
You have been forced to work in the Fat Cat Food Factory.
You can slave your days away for the cats…
Or gather the fellow rats and start a RATVOLUTION!

To organize a revolution you must gather two followers from each of the levels.

Move by using the: W,A,S,D or arrow keys and speak to your fellow rat workers using the mouse…

Finally, don’t let the cats catch you…

Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #22
Theme: Revolution
Wildcard used:
   Who are you?
   Feature NPCs you can interact with in your game

Credits:

Oskar 'Skar' van Velden - lead developer
Indrek - writing
Janiform - pixel artist
Quill - animator / artist
Katarsis Studio - sound
Randomcode - developer

Source can be checked here: https://github.com/skarnl/godoobs-gwj22
